ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Mandeep Educational & Social Welfare Society is being a guiding force behind the achievements has been actively involved in higher-end Vocational & Non Vocational , skill development trainings at its own premise and out premise of various districts. The Organization feels proud on contributing successful entrepreneurs & skilled workers on jobs for different roles. The organization strives & desires to further fulfill the visions & values of Mandeep Educational & Social Welfare Society by contributing in recognition of Skills Development sector to highest limit in India. Our basic to advanced & Technical training curriculums are designed for those new to the computer as well as for those who wish to improve their existing technical skills and to acquire new skills for employment or specialized tasks. We Create Skilled Professionals Launched in 2006, Mandeep Educational & Social Welfare Society continues to be one of Indiaâ€™s leading institutions of education and trainings in skills development sector. ME&SWS is a NGO register under Society Registration act 1973 .having corporate office in Indore with jurisdiction to operate anywhere in India. Till date more than 2112 students have studied & trained through various centers & sectors. We focused on creating versatile skilled professionals majorly womenâ€™s and youths who can apply their knowledge & skills anywhere in the world

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MANTHAN is a professionally managed social organization, working for last several years in the field of skill development in various states of India. Manthan is proud to have highly qualified and skilled technocrats working with true dedication for socio-economic upliftment of rural community and their economy through Technology Transfer and Entrepreneurship development and has the adequate infrastructure and skilled manpower for imparting training programs. We are associated/partnered with NABARD/CAPART/MoRD/NIRD, BHEL etc. We have so far completed various projects with Ministry of Rural Development (MoRD) and state government for skill development. The total trained beneficiaries are 21,000 out of which 16,000 are placed in various industries/companies.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Natya lok sanskritik evam samajik sanstha panch sal se Art&Culture ki field mein kam kar rahi hai.260Jan 2012 Gadtantra Diwas Parade mein Dindori Jile ke 160 students ko lok nritya GUDUM BAJA ki prastuti RAJ PATH par di.is lok nritye ko FIRST PRISE DIYA GAYA.hamari sanskriti jaise Lok Nritya,Lok Gayan,Lok vadan,Lok Sanskar,Natak,Lok Natya,Samajik Kuritiya.Sarkari Yojna adi vishyo par kam karti hai.Sarkar dwara ayojit Mahotsavo jaise Bharat Parv[26 jan],Narmada Mahotsav,Nohta Mahotsav,Rahas Mela,Sonpur mela[patna],Bundeli mela,Dainek Bhaskar mela,Gwalior mela adi mein apane Lok nrityo,lok sangeet ki prastuti kar chuki hai.NATAK ke kshetra mein 15 natako ka Direction jaise,Jo ram rachi rakha,Bhed aur Bhediye,Girgit,Matadeen chand par,Thakur ka kua,Jadu ka suit,Banjha,adi natko ka manchan desh ke kai distt[Bhopal,Allahabad,Jaipur,Ujjain,Indore,Gawalior,Mandla,Balaghat aadi] mein kar chuki hai.1000 se jyada nukkad natak alag alag vishyo[Aids,Women Impowerment,Bharastachar,Traffic rules,Shiksha,Anti Tobecco aadi] par kar chuki hai.Children Theatre par bhi hamari sanstha 1 sal se kam kar rahi hai.Folk Dance Workshos,Drama Workshops,resarch workon tribals,Folk Band,Mime adi vishyo par bhi sanstha kam kar rahi hai
